content: number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch in other words 1sc = one single_crochet whereas 2sc = two single_crochet worked into one stitch also known as an increase **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ | blog https //virkadia etsy com | etsy https //www instagram com/virkadia | instagram https //www pinterest com/virkadia | pinterest https //www facebook com/virkadia | facebook https //www tiktok com/@virkadia | tiktok **thank you for all of your support **
